name: Screamo
description: Intense, aggressive and complex approach to Emo featuring higher levels of abrasiveness and dissonance, accompanied by guitar-focused melodicism and harsh vocals.

children.name: Emoviolence
children.description: Shorter length and volatile song structures, while borrowing techniques from Powerviolence such as blast beats, unconventional screaming and noisier sounds.
